entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS AROUND 70
